channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Loading Multiple Files from Various Folders in R
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Problem Statement This tutorial shows you how to load multiple files from multiple folders using R. As a bonus, this article will also show you how to add the folder and file names to the tibble. Load Libraries Tidyverse and readxl are the only libraries required for this tutorial. library(tidyverse) library(readxl) Data Description In this example, Spotify playlist data was downloaded using Exportify.

item.title: My First Post: Gratitude and Motivation
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando First, I want to give a shout out to the individuals that I grind it out with every day at White Lodging. Our team leader Adam Hutsler and BI Manager Max Thomas are always coming up with creative ways to solve complex problems and create business value using Tableau and R. I was also inspired to create this data science blog based on the work performed by Matt Dancho.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
